00022 void MseRunPeriodX::Init()
00023 {

00053 void MseRunPeriodX::PrintAsPhp(FILE *f) const
00054 {
00055    fprintf(f, "$rc['start_time']                     = %d;\n", (int) time_t(start_time));
00056    fprintf(f, "$rc['polarimeter_id']                 = %d;\n", (short) polarimeter_id);
00057    fprintf(f, "$rc['alpha_calib_run_name']           = \"%s\";\n", string(alpha_calib_run_name).c_str());
00058    fprintf(f, "$rc['alpha_source_count']             = %d;\n",     (unsigned char) alpha_source_count);
00059    fprintf(f, "$rc['disabled_channels']              = \"%s\";\n", disabled_channels.c_str());
00060    fprintf(f, "$rc['disabled_bunches']               = \"%s\";\n", disabled_bunches.c_str());
00061    fprintf(f, "$rc['cut_proto_slope']                = %f;\n", cut_proto_slope);
00062    fprintf(f, "$rc['cut_proto_offset']               = %f;\n", cut_proto_offset);
00063    fprintf(f, "$rc['cut_proto_width']                = %d;\n", (unsigned char) cut_proto_width);
00064    fprintf(f, "$rc['cut_proto_adc_min']              = %f;\n", cut_proto_adc_min);
00065    fprintf(f, "$rc['cut_proto_adc_max']              = %f;\n", cut_proto_adc_max);
00066    fprintf(f, "$rc['cut_proto_tdc_min']              = %f;\n", cut_proto_tdc_min);
00067    fprintf(f, "$rc['cut_proto_tdc_max']              = %f;\n", cut_proto_tdc_max);
00068    fprintf(f, "$rc['cut_pulser_adc_min']             = %f;\n", cut_pulser_adc_min);
00069    fprintf(f, "$rc['cut_pulser_adc_max']             = %f;\n", cut_pulser_adc_max);
